title: FS Ty Cobb Pinkerton scorecard blank back
author: T206Jim

posts.post_title: FS Ty Cobb Pinkerton scorecard blank back
posts.post_content:
Offered is a 1913-1915 Pinkerton blank back Ty Cobb which is standard postcard size.  The price is SOLD shipped.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=288885&d=1506382822[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=288886&d=1506382841[/IMG]
5 minutes after posting??   Come on give a guy a chance!!!!  and I was buying strong too..........
